sentences: 19. sajandi lõpu kirjanduses levisid pessimistlikud ideed.
Dekadentsi ilminguid võib näha mitmes kunstis.
context: In Estonian, 'lõpu' appears to be a form of the word 'dekadents' (decadence) from the dictionary definition provided. It refers to a cultural decline, deterioration, or fall characterized by pessimistic and nihilistic attitudes in literature and art, particularly at the end of the 19th century and beginning of the 20th century.
